pages.text: $(li)The Poise Forest is a biome composed of mostly Poismoss and Eumus.$(br)$(li)It can be found in the End.$(br)$(li)You can find Poise trees, Bolloom Buds, Bolloom Fruits, Poise Bushes and Poise Beehives in this biome.
$(li)Some animals like Puff Bugs and Booflos can be found in this biome too.$(br)$(li)You can search this biome introducing the words $(l)Poise Forest$() in the search box of the Nature's Compass.
